segments.text: Hi , Linda . I have two concert complimentary tickets . Will you go with me tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With the greatest pleasure ! Where is the concert held this evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be held at the Central Music Hall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s a piano solo . I'm fond of piano , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hah ! OK . Let ’ s go together !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s meet at the park at 6:00 .
segments.speaker: S2
